content: this gift bag is worked from the bottom up beginning with one flat rectangular piece that is then joined to work in the round finished measurements circumference 28 length 19 premier yarns anti-pilling everyday bulky 100% anti-pilling acrylic 3 5oz/100g 87yds/80m #1068-05 black 1 ball a #1068-01 snow 2 balls b #1068-08 red 2 balls c #1068-02 linen 1 ball d #1068-06 gold 1 ball e us size l-11 8mm crochet hook gauge 11 single_crochet x 12 row = 4 in single_crochet 2 1 safety eyes or buttons pompom maker
